author: AMY SMITH THE NEWS-ENTERPRISE
title: Stellar Award winner to perform in free concert tonight | Worship | thenewsenterprise.com
text: All Nations Worship Ministries is bringing Zacardi Cortez, one of today’s most talked about gospel voices, to Radcliff for a free concert. Gloria Fite, a pastor at ANWM, is responsible for bringing Cortez to the community. Snow this morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.. Occasional snow showers. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Updated: December 29, 2023 @ 8:23 am All Nations Worship Ministries is bringing Zacardi Cortez, one of today’s most talked about gospel voices, to Radcliff for a free concert. Gloria Fite, a pastor at ANWM, is responsible for bringing Cortez to the community.
